price: 74. Zij zeiden: “Nee, maar onze vaders deden het ook.”
arabic: قَالُواْ بَلۡ وَجَدۡنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا كَذَٰلِكَ يَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: qālū bal wajadnā ābāanā kadhālika yafʿalūna
